column5: I remember last year seeing a pic of someone's christmas tree decorated with lures. If you have it, can you post it in this thread?
You mean TJ's tree from last year???        You can see the rest of the pics here.... http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...pic=1196&hl=
Definitely wouldn't want to get hammered up and fall into that tree..haha
This is the  authentic OFC tree.
DANG Roy ! Did ya take that shot before you got all the snow the other day?
If it were Roy's tree it would be made of Milwakee's  Maureen
You may be both wrong... can you read the labels?
